title: Test Execution Framework
description: As a QA engineer, I want to execute automated test suites so that I can ensure code quality and prevent regressions.
soThat: I can ensure code quality and prevent regressions
acceptanceCriteria: Given test cases are defined, when the test suite runs, then all tests execute without errors
Given failing tests exist, when the suite completes, then detailed failure reports are generated
Given test coverage metrics, when analysis runs, then coverage meets the 80% threshold
